Batman,
damn, now I have to start all over again on that " article " we are 
supposed to work on............
as I recall, it was determined that if the design go over the seppai 
dai area, then it's just one of those " decorative " thingie in the 
style of tsuba. 
If it's done by one of the " master ", you wouldn't think he forgot 
the accepted convention, ja? 
Cheeky indeed !!

milt
